maltaProject
Class FileOperations

java.lang.Object
  maltaProject.FileOperations

public class FileOperations
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to obtain a string from a given file. When constructed, the file location is passed to the program. The getText method is then used to return the string from the given file.

Author:
Nicholas Ingalls
